definition: bit (of a bridle)/to hold in the mouth/to harbor (feelings)/to link/to accept/rank/title

sentences.english: The police rank of any traffic policeman who is imposed upon an administrative sanction below removal from post shall be degraded.
sentences.chinese: 受到撤职以下行政处分的交通警察，应当降低警衔。

sentences.english: Reforming the police rank system will promote the personnel construction of public security.
sentences.chinese: 改革警衔制度将对公安队伍建设起到促进作用。

sentences.english: Article 25 The people's police shall practise the system of police ranks according to law.
sentences.chinese: 第二十五条人民警察依法实行警衔制度。

sentences.english: Article 2 A system of police ranks shall be practised for the people's police.
sentences.chinese: 第二条人民警察实行警衔制度。

sentences.english: Article 22 The people's police who are expelled from public service shall be deprived of their police ranks accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 第二十二条人民警察被开除公职的，其警衔相应取消。

definition: warrant officer/petty officer/noncommissioned officer (NCO)/Japanese military officer
to be discharged from military service
